thread.title: Hapless cabbie crashes through the CEILING while putting his Christmas decorations away
thread.title_full: Hapless cabbie crashes through the CEILING while putting his Christmas decorations away

author: Connor Dunn
title: Hapless cabbie crashes through the CEILING while putting his Christmas decorations away
text:
News Hapless cabbie crashes through the CEILING while putting his Christmas decorations away In a hilarious video, the driver tells viewers he has 'no idea' what he is going to say to his partner, Dawn Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Cabbie wraps up Christmas with hilarious blunder Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A hapless cabbie has revealed how he fell through the ceiling while putting his Christmas decorations away in the loft. 
The Liverpool-based driver , who goes by the name "Kevs Cabs" on social media, described his mishap in a hilarious video. 
Footage shows him covering his face with his hand as he explains how he accidentally created a giant hole in his ceiling. 
He tells viewers that he has 'no idea' what he is going to say to his partner, Dawn, about the damage, the Liverpool Echo reports. Kevs Cabs places his hand over his face as he describes how he fell through the ceiling (Photo: Facebook) He tells viewers that he has 'no idea' what he is going to say to his partner, Dawn, about the damage (Photo: Facebook) 
He says on the clip: “Do you know when I said I was going in the loft to put the decorations in? I’ve actually gone through the ceiling.” Read More 
Kev, a viral Facebook sensation, then spins the camera around to show the extent of damage his foot has created. 
Footage shows plaster board and insulation hanging from the ceiling. The taxi driver says the mishap occurred as he was putting his Christmas decorations away in the loft (Photo: Facebook) Footage shows plaster board and insulation hanging from the ceiling, while debris lies on the floor (Photo: Facebook) 
The popular driver seems in total disbelief. Read More Toddler won't stop saying f*** and it's down to her older brother to stop her 
He adds: “I don’t believe it. I knew I was too big for the loft!” 
The cabbie has become well known for his videos, which include picking up a clown in his cab and reacting to be handed a new £5 note by a customer. Like us on Facebook
